comment._content: Elsie Janis (1889-1956), before she became the "Sweetheart of the AEF": en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elsie_Janis

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The photo appears to have been taken aboard a ship in [New York] harbor. But was Elsie arriving, or preparing to depart these shores?

pennylrichardsca:

Thank you for the information on Ms. Janis. We will add more detail when we update the record.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Aug 7, 1913 NYT has Elsie Janis and the Littletons (next picture www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3819813459/ ) as passengers on the Imperator from Europe. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9404E0DF123FE633A... So this is probably taken in early August 1913.
